chats.question: Content
chats.answer:
This is doc for To-Do notes  
Write here things you want to do

chats.question: Format
chats.answer:
* Section is main category of to-do's, it has only title  
* Multiple to-do notes can be added to section, they have title and content, naming and describing what you want to do  
* For example, add Tutorials as section, add notes Stool woodworking, Apple Pie to it

chats.question: Accounts
chats.answer: Check and/or close my online public service accounts

chats.question: Needed improvements
chats.answer:
Basic:
1. Rename button Choose a JSON file to Open  
2. Rename button Toggle Dark Mode to Theme  
3. Add current file name text
4. Add button Refresh to refresh current file  
5. Add mobile style and desktop style  
6. Do not remove inputs from form after submiting it  
7. Fix light/dark theme style  
8. Edit Category form editor  
9. Add date of note creation and update to data and to html pages ui  

Medium:
1. Add templates to copy in editor to speed writing

Big:
1. Create api for notes app

chats.question: Relax audio
chats.answer: Cut agni sutra vocal from 19 min to sample audio chunk that can induce relax

chats.question: Needed improvements
chats.answer:
1. Name of the task in session or even pomodoro  
2. Popup when sound is off
